description: Data is from the Comptroller of the Defense Department and the budget justifications published by the Army, Navy, Air Force and DoD. We cross referenced line items in the Defense Procurement Program budget with the budget justifications to see how many programs benefited one company.

We cross referenced line items in the Defense Procurement Program budget with the budget justifications to see how many programs benefited one company.

name: Procurement Programs Geared to One Contractor
